title: An Honest Look At Life
review: I wish there was a sequel that showcased the aftermath of all that happened in the end, but I feel the ending as is appropriate. The acting was amazing and the film did a great job fleshing out everyone's situation.

title: OMG some of the reviews here ...
review: Can someone explain to some of the reviewers here that homophobia is awful and that those 3 cases correspond to real terrorist attacks that happened in the last 3 years around the globe (do you live in a box mate???)

title: Film with no message
review:
After patiently sitting though this rather tedious film, I guess I am trying to figure out what the actual theme was.
Mass murder has actually decreased worldwide and in the USA, not increased.
